channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Hey, Ross here! The Equal-Weight S&P 500 Index (RSP) just posted a bullish engulfing candle the day after Fed Day, joined by similar patterns in the S...
